member.name: T:EPiServer.Personalization.MaxMindGeolocationOptions
member.summary: Options for the .

member.name: P:EPiServer.Personalization.MaxMindGeolocationOptions.DatabasePath
member.summary: The location of the database file. This can be absolute or relative to the webroot or, when outside the web environment, relative to the current executing directory.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Personalization.MaxMindGeolocationOptions.Capabilities
member.summary: Explicit definition of the capabilities of the provider.
member.remarks: This option does not need to be set when a standard MaxMind database is used.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Personalization.MaxMindGeolocationOptions.LocationsDatabasePath
member.summary: Path to the CSV locations database file that should be used by the .

member.name: P:EPiServer.Personalization.MaxMindGeolocationOptions.LocationsCulture
member.summary: Specifies the that should be used to compare locations loaded from the CSV-file specified by the . Default is "en".

member.name: T:EPiServer.Personalization.MaxMindGeolocationProvider
member.summary: Implementation of for MaxMind Geolocation databases based on the .mmdb format.
member.remarks: This provider have currently only been verified with MaxMind GeoLite2 Country and City geo databases.
